Project 2: Text File Preprocessor Difficulty: 1/10 | Duration: 2-3 days
| Tech: Python, String Methods, Regex
What You Build: A program that reads text files, removes punctuation, con-
verts to lowercase, removes extra spaces, and saves cleaned text to new file.
Exact Steps: 1. Read text file line by line 2. Remove punctuation
(!@#$%^&*()_+) 3. Convert all text to lowercase 4. Remove extra spaces
(multiple spaces â†’ single space) 5. Save cleaned text to new file 6. Show
before/after comparison 
Learning Goals: - String manipulation - Text cleaning techniques - Regular
expressions (regex) - File I/O with Python
Real-World Use: Data cleaning for any project, log file processing, preparing
text for NLP
